original_text: And he shall lay his hand on the head of the sin offering and kill the sin offering in the place of burnt offering.
korean_text: 그 속죄제물의 머리에 안수하고 그 제물을 번제물을 잡는 곳에서 잡을 것이요

sentences.original_text: And he shall lay his hand on the head of the sin offering
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 속죄 제물의 머리에 손을 얹고

sentences.original_text: in the place of burnt offering
